SummaryEnglish: Compilation movie of episodes from Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion R2, specifically covering the events of Episode 17 onward. Lelouch 's dreams of destroying Britannia are crumbling. His sister has been kidnapped by Schneizel. The Black Knights are slowly losing faith in him as their leader. Lelouch makes a final decision, to destroy the Empire by himself from within.
Aliases: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch III - Oudou
Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion Episode III
